t: Andy Jassy - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Andrew R. Jassy (born January 13, 1968) is an American business executive who is the president and chief executive officer of Amazon. Before being appointed by Jeff Bezos and the Amazon board during the fourth quarter of 2020, Jassy had been the SVP and CEO of Amazon Web Services from 2003 to 2021.
